author: Mg Spitfire
comment: Fantastic product and app. Worth every penny. I HIGHLY recommend it to anyone interested.

author: M.Raffi Sultan
comment: Every time I got problem

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my. We are here to support.

author: Conrado Panis
comment: Where i can buy the receiver o sensor for the tire.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please contact fobo@salutica.com.my for more information. You may also pay a visit to the following link, https://my-fobo.com/Product.

author: Vigneswara Rao
comment: Been using this for about almost 2 years now and has never failed me. Saved me twice on early detection of puncture by nail and screw. Easy to use but of cause still can improve. Would be great to have a graph to see how the pressure is while driving to get more data. Real time upload to mobile sync would be awesome. But overall it's an excellent device ad a definite need to ensure safety.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Thanks for your suggestions. We will take your suggestions into consideration. Enjoy using FOBO!

author: untaken name
comment: Has never worked consistently for me, took my first set back to the shop for a replacement but that's the same as well, box buzzes all the time and won't read pressures even with new batteries. Some little kid stole one of them as well (looked on cctv), you can easily unscrew them by hand even if you tighten them up with the included tool. Overally this product has been a complete waste of money for me, have taken it off the car and will probably bin it, good idea but flawed in execution.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my. We are here to help.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my to further elaborate the issue. We are here to help.

author: MOHD DZULKARNAEN
comment: Being using for almost a year.. Perfect!!

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. Enjoy using FOBO!

author: kovit vichadee
comment: buy from lazada 2dec16 + free 4 pcs. spare batt. ,1^st time can't install sensor found all built in batt 0 v.  check all free batt 3.2v repl & install ok but 20 days later, batt display in fobo app 25% and 1 tire diaplay red batt alarm check this batt 2.8v and others 3v. then change all with new batt now waiting alarm.this app work good and best if add data logging feature.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, thanks for your feedback! Please take note we do have a "Send Log" feature under General Settings. It will bring you to the email app and you can cc to yourself to have the log files. Enjoy using FOBO!

title: work good pls add data logging feature

author: David Crepaz-Keay
comment: Very useful app but had some problems transfering to new phone.  Now working fine and very responsive customer service team.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, you do not need to connect to new phone due to cross pair technology. Just login using the same email address will do. Should you have any enquiries, please email to fobo@salutica.com.my. We are here to help.

author: Patricia McDowell
comment: Failed to connect to an Android 5.0 device. Phone sees it, app doesn't. Never received email registration.  Tried to enter email address at designated site but site server does not exist. Waste of money. Update: Got a response from FOBO. App finally recognized the controller.  Set up sensors and now can see pressures. Would give 5 stars if not for the email mishap. I have the motorcycle app that works well, but the shop lost one sensor so I need another.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my to further elaborate your issue. Sorry for inconvenience caused.

title: Fobo Tire App

author: Anthony Rojas
comment: I signed up using my email and I don't get no respond from them so I can't log in at all.....

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi, please double check whether your email is correct and try again. If you still facing this issue, kindly send your email address to fobo@salutica.com.my and we will manually activate for you. Have a nice day.

title: Doesn't work

author: Joseph Anderson
comment: Does not pair on Android N. Works fine on M.

author: Alex Teo
comment: Served its purpose, reliable and trustworthy!
title: IPO-ed this company

author: Faisal Fatri
comment: After a year used this device its so usefull and thanks to salutica team..

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi Faisal, thanks for your feedback. Enjoy using FOBO!

title: Good Device

author: Lars Norlin
comment: Works nicely with my Sony Xperia z3.
title: Works as expected

author: Mark Bartolo
comment: Simply worth every penny
title: Great

author: Morgan Scruggs
comment: If this review was for the overall FOBO product i would give it 4 stars.  When working, the overall product is good. It reads tire pressure and temperature well.  This review however is for the app.  The app itself was failed in many respects.    1) i can only have 1 device logged in at a time.  I can authorize other e-mails to view the data, but only 1 device per e-mail.    2) app failed to add the main unit many times, and tire sensors a couple of times.     3) no widget for app to display tire pressure without opening app.    4) app runs in foreground and displays a notification 24/7   On a final note, i increased this review from a 2 star to a 4 star due to customer service.  This review got a quick response which is rare these days.  I still think the app could use improvements, but customer service is greatly appreciated.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content:
Hi Morgan, here is our reply.
1) In-car can be only paired to one email for security purpose. However, you  can share to multiple emails.
2) Please write to fobo@salutica.com.my for further troubleshooting.
3) We do have overlay service that lay on top of other applications.
4) You can disable the service by pulling down the notification a little.

author: Tanin Uthayanaka
comment: Seems to be working but had lots of "error" messages when installing the sensors
title: Galaxy Note 5

author: William Kwong
comment: It seems that when the app is running in the background it doesn't refresh psi readings. It's a bit silly when I cannot close the app and it does nothing in the background! Also one sensor stops to work in about 6 months. I replaced the battery and tried pairing with another phone and it still doesn't work. Please add an exit switch in the next software update  if possible.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi William, you can "pull" down the notification a little bit and a "disable" button will show. Kindly click on the "disable" button to exit the application. For further inquiries, please contact fobo@salutica.com.my.

title: Please refresh in background

author: Ivan Averia
comment: Good. But supporting pebble would make it better
title: Pebble support?

author: Ng than pooi
comment: Oppo is supported, good job.
title: Love it!

author: Martin Clapham
comment: On track my cold tyre pressures can be 21 psi to hit a hot pressure of 26 psi so I'm not sure the system will meet the needs I bought it for. As others have said could do with landscape mode and faster refresh.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi Martin, our Fobo Tire does support off road mode that suit your needs. Any further inquiries, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my.

title: Needs lower psi for track

author: Kevin Watkins
comment: Put 40 psi in rear tires left reports 34 right reports 31.  Put 36 in front tires right reports 30 left reports 32.  This oddness started after a weather temperature change worked fine in the summer, colder Temps not so well.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Hi Kevin, please write to fobo@salutica.com.my for further clarifications.

title: Incorrect pressures

author: Itai Schechter
comment: The Android wear app looks great, keep up the good work :)

author: Zeng Sheng Liu
comment: The new notification system is a nice addition. One problem I have is that is one (or more) sensor is missing and show up again later (bad signal), it still show multiple notifications on the status bar. It also doesn't dismiss the notification when the signal come back on.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content:
Dear Zeng, by changing any pressure setting, the "last data sync time" must disappear till the
app sync with in-car again. In order to force syncing, please bring the tire status page on foreground and long press on in-car unit button. Please contact fobo@salutica.com.my if any issue rise. We will consider indication for last read of sensors also.

title: Nice, but could be better

author: Frederick Lavoie
comment: Need landscape view for android
title: Good

author: Dwaine Garden
comment: Need Landscape mode

author: Patrick Heng
comment: I have bought your tpms 2 weeks ago from your distributor in usj malaysia but the battery life seems draining out . The worst part is your distributor don't even care to troubleshoot for me. My question now is " is your product reliable in the first place ?" Frankly speaking, took me almost 5 mins everytime for me to pair with my phone. I was wondering is my S6 having problem?

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content:
Hi Patrick,

Please click the setting and send log file to fobo@salutica.com.my. Our customer support team will be ready to solve your problem. No worries.

Have a nice day!

title: Battery life

author: Skyblade
comment: I like this product it's very good however one minor downfall is that it doesn't have the option to put a widget on your phone home screen. Maybe this will be a option in the next update? Would of give it 5* if this was available
title: Great product!

author: Spyware Clips
comment: Badly needs a manual setting for the refresh frequency. Default is too slow.
title: Does not refresh often

author: Lachlan Mullen
comment: Two of my sensors stopped reporting so I removed them but now none of the sensors will re-pair with my phone. App is from another planet, UI-wise. It's a great concept, which is why I backed their crowd funding, but it hasn't improved since launch. Nexus 6.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content:
Hi Lachlan,

Thanks for writing in.
Kindly send us the screen shot of the pressure page and also send us your log file ( Just go to FOBO Tire App of your car setting at the top right, from the pop up window; please select "Send Log").

Any inquiries, please contact fobo@salutica.com.my.

title: Not reliable

author: ANna AnNa
comment: Very useful and it works well
title: Great product and app

author: Keri Holmes Rojas
comment: Had problem with initial pairing. Fobo team reset my device for pairing within minutes. And it was the middle of the night where they were.
title: Great customer support.

author: Sinned Dennis
comment: Can't login to more than a phone??? Not too useful for more than a driver.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Dear Sir, Our security policy limits us to link a product with one user and device. However we implemented FOBO Share to overcome this limitation. Please refer to user manual, our website or email fobo@salutica.com.my for further info.

author: Marin Koceić
comment: Product is very good but software and aplication are making me crazy!!! If i can have more than one vehicle registred why I can't have the same account on multiple devices. E.g. I'm not always driving the car and I want my wife to have the application on her device and check pressure.....FOBO fix this urgently. I will write to developers on crowd funding too as i was close to clame money back when I got the product but was patient as an early backer. I AM REALLY PISSED!!!!

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Dear Marin, sorry for the inconvenience. We bind the device to the user account regarding our security strategy. However we provide a FoboShare feature which address user's need to have car data among different devices. Please refer to our website or email fobo@salutica.com.my for further info. We would love to hear from you in FOBO team.

title: REACTIVATION AND LOGIN AND MORE DEVICES

author: Chee-Yean Loo
comment: In the past I had never bother about my tyres' pressure. Leading to unessary stuck out in midnight changing flat tyres in a remote road. Thinking back it was dangerous. Later I had install a build in unit in my old car, costed Malaysian Ringgit around 1000, it did save me 2 times, and get my tyres repair before flat out. Now with my new car, I had installed this Fobo tire, and it is so much nicer, and costed less. I had bought another unit for my wife's car too.
title: Best car tyre pressure monitoring device

author: Dan Durham
comment: Great product - can't wait for app updates - screen rotation, selectable cars, extra sensors for the trailer, spare wheel, etc.

author: bradley de villiers
comment: Fobo Tire has already saved me the cost of a tyre replacement. ..loving the product :)

author: Mohd Aizat Idris
comment: The sensors and the app are working fine for me.
title: Working fine

author: GRISREE NPJ
comment: I just update new version on yesterday and drive through rain on today. The message "Err" show on screen i think the new version is slower than the last version.  The product is good but need to improve App a little bit.

reply.author: Salutica Allied Solutions Sdn Bhd
reply.content: Please update to version 2.4 which addresses the "Err" issue.

title: Fobo tire "err" problem
